commentary.text: Starc bowls full outside off, Rohit leans into the drive and creams it through covers for a boundary.
Good length ball angling in, Rohit defends solidly back to the bowler.
Short ball! Rohit rocks back and pulls it high and handsome over midwicket for a massive six.
Tucked off the pads towards fine leg, theyâ€™ll take a comfortable single.
Back of a length outside off, Kohli watches it closely and lets it go.
Driven straight past the bowler, excellent timing and they come back for two.
